title: Life in Ancient Greece: home and education
brief_description: Pictures the activities of a typical family living in Athens, Greece in 400 BC. Studies manner of dress, religion, education, and in particular a pottery factory through using a story about a young boy and a vase. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
